attributes.action: Tax rebate for the remainder of UK if Scotland goes Independent
attributes.additional_details: If Scotland votes yes to independence, I believe the remainder of the tax payers in the UK would be entitled to a tax rebate, or at least future lower taxes as we would not have to pay for Scotland's share of the transportation network upkeep, benefits, pensions, armed forces, etc.

rejection.details: This E Petition has been declined due to the outcome of the Scotland Vote.
